articles.description:
Re Squeeth (standing for squared eth) is the first on-chain power perpetual. Itâ€™s similar to an option, but without expiries or strike prices, and enables no liquidations for longs.
Squeeth is an ERC20 token that tracks the price of ETH, raised to the power of two.
